name: AZIMAR
description:
Explore, Fight, Upgrade, and  grind your way through the world of azimar What is AZIMAR?

Azimar is currently a work in progress which involves the use of Convolutional Neural Networks to analyze a player's handwriting, and then, based on Graphologycal analysis, it classifies you into one of four different e player types based on Bartle's taxonomy

State of AZIMAR?

Azimar is currently under pre-alpha state, so feel free to try it and give feedback, I will continue polishing the soon predictions and the game itself and try to be as active as possible with the people who get interested in the project.

Credits

-Game by WoWPerrroDev-

-Music by Oscar Rojano-
